              </m_sShaderProperties>
            </ComposableMaterial>
          </m_aMaterials>
        </ComposableFBX>
        <ComposableFBX>
          <m_sFileName>empty</m_sFileName>
          <m_aMaterials />
        </ComposableFBX>
      </m_aFbxs>
    </ComposablePart>
  </m_aParts>
</ComposableCharacter>
